## html.BuildSrcSetOptions interface

Options for `buildSrcSet` and `defineSrcSetBuilder`<!-- -->: target image widths or pixel densities.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface BuildSrcSetOptions
```

## Remarks

`widths` take precedence if both are provided.

</td><td>
